## üöÄ Getting Started

### For Complete Beginners

1. **Start with Introduction** (#110, #111, #194-#196)
2. **Move to Variables** (#197-#199)
3. **Practice Control Flow** (#200-#205)
4. **Try Simple Projects** (#225-#228)

### For Those with Some Experience

1. **Data Structures** (#206-#210)
2. **Functions** (#212-#215)
3. **File Handling** (#217-#221)
4. **OOP** (#223-#224)

### For Intermediate Developers

1. **Web APIs** (#229-#231, #234)
2. **Advanced Projects** (#170-#173)
3. **LLM/AI** (#184-#189)

---

## üìù Issue Quality Standards

Every practice issue includes:

‚úÖ **Clear Title** - `[PRACTICE] [folder-difficulty] Program Name`  
‚úÖ **Difficulty Level** - Easy ‚≠ê / Intermediate ‚≠ê‚≠ê / Advanced ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê  
‚úÖ **Description** - What to build  
‚úÖ **Skills Practiced** - Concepts covered  
‚úÖ **Expected Learning** - Learning outcomes  
‚úÖ **File Location** - Where to create the file  
‚úÖ **Acceptance Criteria** - 4+ checklist items  
‚úÖ **Proper Labels** - feature, good first issue, beginner/intermediate/advanced
